TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Mararo’ong, title = Mararo’ong, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mararo’ong} }

S.FORM: alang Mararo'ong ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Cinkong Song, kwara sali buwan nya ga 250 buwan, 579 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 63% kyan ku 363 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 37% kyan ku 216 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Amis 58%, Paywan 1%, binah lihuyan s'uli 3%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Mararo'ong hya' ga Folalacay. tay mkyahu' na Mararo'ong hya' ga Pisirian. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Mararo'ong ga niya mki sko Tayto Keng ato Cinkong Song, kwara sali bowan nya ga 250 bowan, 579 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 63% kyan ko 363 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 37% kyan ko 216 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Amis 58%, Paywan 1%, binah lihoyan s'oli 3%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Mararo'ong hya' ga Folalacay. tay mkyaho' na Mararo'ong hya' ga Pisirian. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
